<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inexhaustible Countermoves](/Feats.aspx?ID=1559) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses. At the start of each enemy's turn, you gain an extra reaction you can use only during that turn to perform an [Opportune Riposte](/Actions.aspx?ID=551), or an [Attack of Opportunity](/Feats.aspx?ID=145) if you have that reaction.
name: Inexhaustible Countermoves
